response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a symbol of unparalleled quality and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe its value exceeds $800,000. Considering its exceptional nature, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for exceptional items and provide you with a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 750000}
